TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadDataCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadDataCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: que contiene los datos del evento.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra la carga asincrónica de datos.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading data. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#34)] El siguiente método se llama cuando se completa la carga.The following method is called when the upload completes.
